thread.title: Fleet Foxes Drop First New Song in Years: "Third of May / Ōdaigahara"
thread.title_full: Fleet Foxes Drop First New Song in Years: "Third of May / Ōdaigahara"

author: Noisey Staff
title: Fleet Foxes Drop First New Song in Years: "Third of May / Ōdaigahara"
text:
Fleet Foxes Drop First New Song in Years: "Third of May / Ōdaigahara" Six years after their last record, the band are set to release 'Crack-Up' is out June 16. This song is really rather lovely. 
It's been a hot minute, or six years, since Robin Pecknold and his band of emotionally charged folksters released a record, but behold! Here is one long, softly spun, nimbly plucked (is that a 12 string guitar? Yes it is!) folk-pop, along with news that FF's third album, Crack-Up, will hit the shelves on June 16th. Named after a bunch of F. Scott Fitzgerald essays, the record was written by Pecknold, who also co-produced the record with long time Fleet Fox, Skyler Skjelset. Listen below and catch the band on tour this summer. 
Fleet Foxes Tour Dates 
May 26 | Sydney, Australia at Sydney Opera HouseMay 27 | Sydney, Australia at Sydney Opera HouseMay 28 | Sydney, Australia at Sydney Opera HouseMay 29 | Sydney, Australia at Sydney Opera HouseJuly 1 | Spain, Vilanova i la Geltrú at Vida FestivalJuly 3 | Italy, Ferrara at Bands ApartJuly 7 | Spain, Bilbao at Bilbao BBK LiveJuly 13 | Ireland, Dublin at The Iveagh GardensJuly 14 | Ireland, Dublin at The Iveagh Gardens (SOLD OUT)July 16 | United Kingdom, Southwold at Latitude FestivalJuly 27 | Portland ME at Thompson's PointJuly 28 | Newport RI at Newport Folk Festival (SOLD OUT)July 29 | Columbia MD at Merriweather Post Pavilion w/ Animal CollectiveJuly 31 | Philadelphia PA at Mann Center for the Performing Arts w/ Animal CollectiveAugust 1 | Brooklyn NY at BRIC Celebrate Brooklyn! Festival at the Prospect Park BandshellAugust 4 | Toronto ON at Massey HallAugust 6 | Detroit MI at The MasonicSeptember 23 | Los Angeles CA at Hollywood Bowl w/ Beach HouseSeptember 27 | Morrison CO at Red Rocks Amphitheater w/ Beach House 
Crack-Up is out June 16th via Nonsuch Records.
